# taskHint

**Instance Property**

A value that indicates the type of speech recognition being performed.

## Declaration

```swift
var taskHint: SFSpeechRecognitionTaskHint { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SFSpeechRecognitionTaskHint/unspecified]. For a valid list of values, see [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SFSpeechRecognitionTaskHint].

## Speech Type Classification

- **SFSpeechRecognitionTaskHint**: The type of task for which you are using speech recognition.
